languages.text: "Наверное, вот что: ты можешь относиться ко мне как угодно, но моя цель — не мешать тебе, а помочь в борьбе с тем, о чем ты можешь и понятия не иметь. Даю тебе слово, что я окажу любое содействие в искоренении ереси, успевшей прорасти на мирах династии фон Валанциус в отсутствие их госпо{mf|дина|жи} — и постараюсь быть снисходительнее к менее страшным грехам, к которым порой тяготеют обладатели {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Наверное, вот что: ты можешь относиться ко мне как угодно, но моя цель — не мешать тебе, а помочь в борьбе с тем, о чем ты можешь и понятия не иметь. Даю тебе слово, что я окажу любое содействие в искоренении ереси, успевшей прорасти на мирах династии фон Валанциус в отсутствие их госпо{mf|дина|жи} — и постараюсь быть снисходительнее к менее страшным грехам, к которым порой тяготеют обладатели {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g}".

languages.text: "Let me put it this way: you may think whatever you want of me, but my goal is not to hinder you. I am here to help you in the fight against foes you may not even be aware of. You have my word that I will provide every assistance in uprooting the heresy that has sprouted on the von Valancius worlds while their {mf|master|mistress} was away — and that I will try to be more patient with the less grievous flaws the bearers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} are sometimes known to have."
languages.original_text: "Наверное, вот что: ты можешь относиться ко мне как угодно, но моя цель — не мешать тебе, а помочь в борьбе с тем, о чем ты можешь и понятия не иметь. Даю тебе слово, что я окажу любое содействие в искоренении ереси, успевшей прорасти на мирах династии фон Валанциус в отсутствие их госпо{mf|дина|жи} — и постараюсь быть снисходительнее к менее страшным грехам, к которым порой тяготеют обладатели {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Let me put it this way: you may think whatever you want of me, but my goal is not to hinder. I am here to help you in the fight against foes you may not even be aware of. You have my word I will provide every assistance in uprooting the heresy that sprouted on the von Valancius worlds while their {mf|master|mistress} was away — and try to be more patient with less grievous sins the owners of the Warrant are sometimes known to have." {n}Heinrix inclines his head.{/n} "Thank you for sparing some of your time, Lord Captain."

"Let me put it this way: you may think whatever you want of me, but my goal is not to hinder. I am here to help you in the fight against foes you may not even be aware of. You have my word I will provide every assistance in uprooting the heresy that sprouted on the von Valancius worlds while their {mf|master|mistress} was away — and try to be more patient with less grievous sins the owners of the Warrant are sometimes known to have." {n}Heinrix inclines his head.{/n} "Thank you for sparing some of your time, Lord Captain."

"Let me put it this way: you may think whatever you want of me, but my goal is not to hinder you. I am here to help you in the fight against foes you may not even be aware of. You have my word that I will provide every assistance in uprooting the heresy that has sprouted on the von Valancius worlds while their {mf|master|mistress} was away — and that I will try to be more patient with the less grievous sins the bearers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} are sometimes known to have." {n}Heinrix inclines his head.{/n} "Thank you for sparing some of your time, Lord Captain."

"Let me put it this way: you may think whatever you want of me, but my goal is not to hinder you. I am here to help you in the fight against foes you may not even be aware of. You have my word that I will provide every assistance in uprooting the heresy that has sprouted on the von Valancius worlds while their {mf|master|mistress} was away — and that I will try to be more patient with the less grievous sins the bearers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} are sometimes known to have." {n}Heinrix inclines his head.{/n} "Thank you for sparing some of your time, Lord Captain."

"Let me put it this way: you may think whatever you want of me, but my goal is not to hinder you. I am here to help you in the fight against foes you may not even be aware of. You have my word that I will provide every assistance in uprooting the heresy that has sprouted on the von Valancius worlds while their {mf|master|mistress} was away — and that I will try to be more patient with the less grievous sins the bearers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} are sometimes known to have."

"Let me put it this way: you may think whatever you want of me, but my goal is not to hinder you. I am here to help you in the fight against foes you may not even be aware of. You have my word that I will provide every assistance in uprooting the heresy that has sprouted on the von Valancius worlds while their {mf|master|mistress} was away — and that I will try to be more patient with the less grievous flaws the bearers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} are sometimes known to have."

languages.text: «Dejémoslo en esto: puede pensar lo que quiera de mí, pero mi objetivo no es servirle de obstáculo. Estoy aquí para ayudarle a luchar contra enemigos de los que puede no ser consciente. Tiene mi palabra de que haré todo lo posible por erradicar la herejía que ha surgido en los mundos de los von Valancius en ausencia de su {mf|amo|ama}, y de que intentaré ser paciente con los pecados menores a los que ocasionalmente son proclives los portadores de una {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}».
languages.original_text: "Let me put it this way: you may think whatever you want of me, but my goal is not to hinder you. I am here to help you in the fight against foes you may not even be aware of. You have my word that I will provide every assistance in uprooting the heresy that has sprouted on the von Valancius worlds while their {mf|master|mistress} was away — and that I will try to be more patient with the less grievous flaws the bearers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} are sometimes known to have."

traits.locale_text: «Dejémoslo en esto: puede pensar lo que quiera de mí, pero mi objetivo no es servirle de obstáculo. Estoy aquí para ayudarle a luchar contra enemigos de los que puede no ser consciente. Tiene mi palabra de que haré todo lo posible por erradicar la herejía que ha surgido en los mundos de los von Valancius en ausencia de su {mf|amo|ama}, y de que intentaré ser paciente con los pecados menores a los que ocasionalmente son proclives los portadores de una {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}». {n}Heinrix inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Gracias por dedicarme su tiempo, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}».

languages.text: “这么说吧，你可能对我有各种各样的看法，但我并不是来阻碍你的。我来这里，是为了帮助你对抗你可能根本没有意识到的敌人。我可以向你保证，我会提供一切帮助，铲除那些异端分子趁冯·瓦兰修斯世界的{mf|主人|女主人}不在时种下的邪恶种子。如果{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}授状{/g}的持有者偶尔犯下了不太严重的错误，我也会试着以更加耐心的态度来对待。”
languages.original_text: "Let me put it this way: you may think whatever you want of me, but my goal is not to hinder you. I am here to help you in the fight against foes you may not even be aware of. You have my word that I will provide every assistance in uprooting the heresy that has sprouted on the von Valancius worlds while their {mf|master|mistress} was away — and that I will try to be more patient with the less grievous flaws the bearers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} are sometimes known to have."

traits.locale_text: “这么说吧，你可能对我有各种各样的看法，但我并不是来阻碍你的。我来这里，是为了帮助你对抗你可能根本没有意识到的敌人。我可以向你保证，我会提供一切帮助，铲除那些异端分子趁冯·瓦兰修斯世界的{mf|主人|女主人}不在时种下的邪恶种子。如果{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}许可证{/g}的持有者偶尔犯下了不太严重的罪过，我也会试着以更加耐心的态度来对待。”{n}海因里希歪了歪头。{/n}“感谢你愿意抽出时间，舰长大人。”

languages.text: 「こう言わせてください。我のことをどう思っても構いませんが、こちらの目的は陛下を邪魔することではありません。もしかしたらお気づきでない敵との戦いで、協力するためにここにいます。主人の居ぬ間に、フォン・ヴァランシウスの惑星に芽生えた異端の根絶に向け、あらゆる力をお貸しすると約束しましょう。そして、{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}保持者がたまに周知の事実で手を染める、それほど重くない過ちについては、もう少し目を瞑るようにしましょう」
languages.original_text: "Let me put it this way: you may think whatever you want of me, but my goal is not to hinder you. I am here to help you in the fight against foes you may not even be aware of. You have my word that I will provide every assistance in uprooting the heresy that has sprouted on the von Valancius worlds while their {mf|master|mistress} was away — and that I will try to be more patient with the less grievous flaws the bearers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} are sometimes known to have."

traits.locale_text: 「こう言わせてください。我のことをどう思っても構いませんが、こちらの目的は陛下を邪魔することではありません。もしかしたらお気づきでない敵との戦いで、協力するためにここにいます。主人の居ぬ間に、フォン・ヴァランシウスの惑星に芽生えた異端の根絶に向け、あらゆる力をお貸しすると約束しましょう。そして、{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}保持者がたまに周知の事実で手を染める、それほど重くない過ちについては、もう少し目を瞑るようにしましょう」

languages.text: "Lasst es mich so sagen: Ihr könnt von mir halten, was Ihr wollt, aber mein Ziel ist es, Euch nicht zu behindern. Ich bin hier, um Euch im Kampf gegen Feinde beizustehen, derer Ihr Euch vielleicht gar nicht bewusst seid. Ich gebe Euch mein Wort, dass ich alles tun werde, um die Ketzerei auszumerzen, die sich auf den Valancius-Welten ausgebreitet hat, solange {mf|ihr Herr|ihre Herrin} andernorts beschäftigt ist ... und dass ich versuchen werde, hinsichtlich der weniger schwerwiegenden Mängel nachsichtiger zu sein, für die Träger des {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefs{/g} mitunter bekannt sind."
languages.original_text: "Let me put it this way: you may think whatever you want of me, but my goal is not to hinder you. I am here to help you in the fight against foes you may not even be aware of. You have my word that I will provide every assistance in uprooting the heresy that has sprouted on the von Valancius worlds while their {mf|master|mistress} was away — and that I will try to be more patient with the less grievous flaws the bearers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} are sometimes known to have."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst es mich so sagen: Ihr könnt von mir halten, was Ihr wollt, aber mein Ziel ist es, Euch nicht zu behindern. Ich bin hier, um Euch im Kampf gegen Feinde beizustehen, derer Ihr Euch vielleicht gar nicht bewusst seid. Ich gebe Euch mein Wort, dass ich alles tun werde, um die Ketzerei auszumerzen, die sich auf den Valancius-Welten ausgebreitet hat, solange {mf|ihr Herr|ihre Herrin} andernorts beschäftigt ist ... und dass ich versuchen werde, hinsichtlich der weniger schwerwiegenden Sünden nachsichtiger zu sein, für die Träger des {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefs{/g} mitunter bekannt sind." {n} Heinrix neigt seinen Kopf.{/n} "Danke, dass Ihr einen Teil Eurer Zeit erübrigt habt, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « J'ajouterai simplement ceci : quelle que soit votre opinion de moi, sachez que je n'ai pas pour but de vous mettre des bâtons dans les roues. Je suis là pour vous aider à lutter contre des ennemis dont vous n'avez peut-être même pas encore conscience. Je promets de vous aider du mieux possible à déraciner l'hérésie qui s'est implantée dans les mondes des von Valancius pendant l'absence de leur {mf|maître|maîtresse}, et de tolérer plus patiemment les erreurs mineures dont se rendent parfois coupables les détenteurs de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "Let me put it this way: you may think whatever you want of me, but my goal is not to hinder you. I am here to help you in the fight against foes you may not even be aware of. You have my word that I will provide every assistance in uprooting the heresy that has sprouted on the von Valancius worlds while their {mf|master|mistress} was away — and that I will try to be more patient with the less grievous flaws the bearers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} are sometimes known to have."

traits.locale_text: « J'ajouterai simplement ceci : quelle que soit votre opinion de moi, sachez que je n'ai pas pour but de vous mettre des bâtons dans les roues. Je suis là pour vous aider à lutter contre des ennemis dont vous n'avez peut-être même pas encore conscience. Je promets de vous aider du mieux possible à déraciner l'hérésie qui s'est implantée dans les mondes des von Valancius pendant l'absence de leur {mf|maître|maîtresse}, et de tolérer plus patiemment les péchés négligeables dont se rendent parfois coupables les détenteurs de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g}.Sur ce, je vous remercie de m'avoir accordé un peu de votre temps, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, » {n}termine Heinrix en inclinant la tête.{/n}

languages.text: "Şöyle diyeyim... Hakkımda istediğini düşünebilirsin ancak hedefim sana köstek olmak değil. Haberinin bile olmadığı düşmanlara karşı vereceğin savaşlarda sana yardım etmek için buradayım. Efendileri yokken von Valancius dünyalarının üzerine çöken her türlü kâfirliğin kökünü kazımak için sana her türlü yardımı sağlayacağım, sözüm olsun. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g} hamillerinin bazen çok da ağır olmayan bazı kusurlara sahip olduğu bilinir, bunlara karşı daha hoşgörülü olmaya çalışacağım."
languages.original_text: "Let me put it this way: you may think whatever you want of me, but my goal is not to hinder you. I am here to help you in the fight against foes you may not even be aware of. You have my word that I will provide every assistance in uprooting the heresy that has sprouted on the von Valancius worlds while their {mf|master|mistress} was away — and that I will try to be more patient with the less grievous flaws the bearers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} are sometimes known to have."

traits.locale_text: "Şu şekilde söyleyeyim: Benim hakkımda istediğini düşünebilirsin ancak hedefim sana köstek olmak değil. Ben sana, haberinin bile olmadığı düşmanlara karşı vereceğin savaşlarda yardım etmek üzere buradayım. Efendileri yokken von Valancius dünyalarının üzerine çöken her türlü kâfirliğin kökünü kazımak için sana her türlü yardımı sağlayacağım, sözüm olsun. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g} sahiplerinin bazen çok da ağır olmayan bazı kusurlara sahip olduğu bilinir, onlara karşı da daha hoşgörülü olmaya çalışacağım."
